message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $9000. It's a fantastic opportunity to get a great deal on something worth $12000 to you!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get a better deal on this product. Can you consider my offer?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm not quite ready to accept $8500. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. How about $9200?

I understand that you're trying to get a fair price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $8800. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your last offer and my initial offer. Can you consider this?
